title: Current direction in loop as magnetic field change

content.question: A circular conducting loop is in a region of magnetic field B directed out of the page, as shown above. The magnitude of the magnetic field is decreasing. The direction of the induced current in the loop is

choices.label: undefined because the current is zero

impossible to determine without knowing 
 the rate of change of the field

impossible to determine without knowing 
 the radius of the loop

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
